document.full_text: the bank of japan kept monetary policy steady on friday in a sign that a first-quarter economic slump failed to undermine the central bank's confidence growth will pick up around autumn when the wounds from the devastating earthquake begin to heal.
document.title: boj holds fire, unfazed by recession and first quarter
lines_and_colors: the bank of japan kept monetary policy steady on friday in a sign that a first-quarter economic slump failed to undermine the central bank's confidence growth will pick up around autumn when the wounds from the devastating earthquake begin to heal.
